lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Gary Chapmann, a cash livestock trader for Chapmann and Graham in Sioux City, Iowa said he believed the general trend is to lighter weight placements but pasture conditions in his area benefited from a dry, mild winter.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After the USDA released its report of cattle on feed in seven states as of March 1, cattle futures on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange yesterday rose sharply.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although reports of actual cattle weights are difficult to obtain, industry sources in the West and Southwest acknowledge that lighter cattle are being put on feedlots in their areas.
